title: Dealing with the World's Future Problems - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/24/17
itunes:title: Dealing with the World's Future Problems - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/24/17
description:
George Noory and guest Kirkpatrick Sale discuss whether he is optimistic humanity will be able to deal with the problems facing our planet in the future, and whether most people realize how serious the problems really are.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
